metadata.name: Findstr Launching .lnk File
metadata.comment: Detects usage of findstr to identify and execute a lnk file as seen within the HHS redirect attack

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\find.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\findstr.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('find\.exe', 'findstr\.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.lnk"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.lnk\''))))

output.summary: Detects usage of findstr to identify and execute a lnk file as seen within the HHS redirect attack
